channel.title: Exion help
channel.description: Today i downloaded exion's server/client. Then i changed the ip of the client to my ip and it was error connecting to server. i changed the ip in "client.java" is their anywere else i should change it or how many times i change it?

Today i downloaded exion’s server/client. Then i changed the ip of the client to my ip and it was error connecting to server. i changed the ip in “client.java” is their anywere else i should change it or how many times i change it?
